item.description:
OOOOPS....Just learned that Johnny Ds kitchen closes at 7;30 on Sundays.

Therefore let's meet in Orleans -65 Holland Street- for dinner and conversation at 8;30 then take a 5 minute walk to Johnny Ds -17 Holland Street- to enjoy the lively powerful sounds of Brazil by Bloco Afro Brazil after 9:30. Once the music begins group conversation will be difficult. Let's just enjoy the party!

Orleans Restaurant Menu

$10 cash cover charge at the door for Bloco Afro Brazil show at Johnny Ds

Bloco Afro Brazil details

Johnny D's drinks

Johnny D's driving and mbta directions
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Orleans and Bloco Afro Brazil at Johnny D's Sunday March 8th
